responses.rationale: Factual reporting of cases, location, and contact without explicit framing cues.
Contains explicit reassuring language: 'risk...is still negligible'.
Contains explicit reassuring language: 'It is rare for avian influenza to infect humans'.
Factual reporting of cases and affected group without explicit framing cues.
Factual reporting of an outbreak and cases without explicit framing cues.
Factual description of potential transmission pathways without explicit framing cues.
Factual description of the illness and its spread using technical/standard terms.
Factual reporting of an outbreak and location using standard terms.
Factual description of a risk group ('at higher risk') without explicit framing cues.
Contains explicit reassuring language from a quoted source: 'risk to the general public remains low'.
Contains explicit reassuring language from a quoted source: 'risk...is considered to be low'.
